result.markdown: --- title: "The cbcTools Package: Tools for Designing and Testing Choice-Based Conjoint Surveys in R" description: | My talk for the 2022 Sawtooth Software Conference date: 05-06-2022 preview: "title.png" categories: - R - surveys - conjoint format: html toc: true --- I gave a talk at the [Sawtooth Software](https://sawtoothsoftware.com/) Conference in Orlando, FL, on May 06, 2022. The talk is titled, "The {cbcTools} Package: Tools for Designing and Testing Choice-Based Conjoint Surveys in R". Learn more about the {cbcTools} package here: https://jhelvy.github.io/cbcTools/ # Talk # Slides My slides were built using the [{xaringan}](https://github.com/yihui/xaringan) R package. You can see the source code for the slides [here](https://github.com/jhelvy/2022-sawtooth-conf). ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} Full screen slides ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html} Slides as PDF ``` ::: ::: Keyboard Shortcuts for Slides: - Use ← and → to navigate through the slides. - Use f to toggle full screen. - Use o to view an overview of all slides. - Use h to see a list of other shortcuts. ::: golden-ratio-wrapper :::
